Indian Economy.title: ExplainSpeaking: What Trump’s tariff abuse teaches India
Indian Economy.summary: Experts suggest that the 50% tariffs could result in India’s GDP falling by more than half a percentage point. But, Trump is not singling out India, and India should not impose retaliatory tariffs. Here's why.
